siyanatharu mese binduwen patan gena ibi gamane idiriyata eddi 50 dashakayedi aarambha kala gampaha senta්ral ka්rida samajaya hate dashakaya pura palathe pamanak nowa ratehima jayakeheli nanwuyeya. 1959 weddi agnidiga aasiyawe hondama wolibol pa්raharakaya lesa sammanayata patha්ra siriwardhana hewath wolibol sira senta්ral ka්ridakayaku wu athara senta්ral ka්rida samajayen sira anuyana thawath wishishtayo kihipadenek bihiwuha.
hemi hemin patan gaththu mage andilla iwuru kadagena wage wadi wenna winadiyakwath yanna nathiwa athi.
